title: League keeps minimizing.
body:
I did a lot of looking and tried a lot of things before I posted this thread, but ever since this ARURF, league has been minimizing its self every 5-10 minutes. 

I did a full restart on my PC and made sure that there was nothing in the background that would close me out. I did a repair and even a full reinstall of league, which I can not do again as I only have 11gb of bandwidth left for the month. 

Any one know any other ways I can possibly fix this?

replies.body: There's a lot of things that could randomly take the main focus away from League like the usual windows popups or possibly even sticky keys popping up from hitting shift too many times in a row. Try doing a quick [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3) to be extra certain that no background programs are running really quick!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YOx94rv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-22T04:21:50.378+0000)
>
> There's a lot of things that could randomly take the main focus away from League like the usual windows popups or possibly even sticky keys popping up from hitting shift too many times in a row. Try doing a quick [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq3) to be extra certain that no background programs are running really quick!

I have already done many clean boots, sticky keys is off because its the most useless feature, and nothing is running in the background.

Weeeeeiiiiird. Something must be opening or something else that's somehow shifting the focus of your window, I can't think of any reason whatsoever as to why League would minimize itself for any other reason other than something interfering with the focus. 

Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs, there might be something hidden in there that can shed some light on this issue!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YOx94rv,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T04:56:39.853+0000)
>
> Weeeeeiiiiird. Something must be opening or something else that's somehow shifting the focus of your window, I can't think of any reason whatsoever as to why League would minimize itself for any other reason other than something interfering with the focus. 
> 
> Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs, there might be something hidden in there that can shed some light on this issue!

I havent had to do logs in so long. How would i get them for the game again?

You can run the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to gather those logs for you! I believe it drops them in a folder on your desktop.

Hey, got removed from the discord, didn't know how else you'd see this. I just wanted to say "Thank you" for being so kind and realising there was a human on the other end of the screen and just taking the time to talk to me. Really, I really really appreciate it. I'm gonna go do something stupid now.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4YOx94rv,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T05:04:42.146+0000)
>
> You can run the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to gather those logs for you! I believe it drops them in a folder on your desktop.

ahh thanks.
